question: Which state launches "T App Folio" app for all government services recently?
explanation: Telangana government launched "T App Folio", a mobile governance application, for delivery of government to citizen (G2C) and business to citizen (B2C) services anytime and anywhere. Telangana IT Minister K T Rama Rao said that, Telangana has become the second state in India to launch a mobile governance application in place for provision of G2C services. T App Folio provides more than 150 services like MeeSeva services, RTA services, fee payments and bill payments, in the first phase. T App Folio will act as a platform to bring together all government departments. It has been launched in Telugu and English languages.
